scripts.watch-style-sass: npm run build-style-sass && node-sass --watch  src/style/all.scss -o static/style/
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p static/js && browserify --debug -t stringify --extensions .html -e src/js/app.js src/js/**/* | exorcist static/js/bundle.js.map > static/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t stringify --extensions .html -e src/js/app.js src/js/**/* -o 'exorcist static/js/bundle.js.map > static/js/bundle.js' -d -v
scripts.watch: npm run watch-testchart-js & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-html & npm run watch-style-sass
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-html & npm run build-style-sass
